original_title: 妄想アイテム究極進化シリーズ 女体化スキンダークサイド ～呪いの皮で悪堕ち～
overview: The skin of a beautiful woman is a cursed skin that cannot be taken off until she gives a command once she wears it. The man inside is dominated by the skin of an evil woman! Losing the erotic body and the pleasure of a woman, she wears the skin that she once took off at her own will. Lesbian rave that relieves resentment "Now, I feel more pleasure of the opposite sex!" Fear of being eroded, irresistible pleasure ... The strange fate of the hero ...
title: Daydream Items, The Ultimate Evolution Series The Dark Side Of Female Skin Transformation - The Evil Downfall Of Her Cursed Skin -
